data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Wycombe with the kick-off.
Jason McCarthy for Wycombe has been booked by Matt Donohue and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 43, Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's first substitution at Vitality Stadium with Nick Freeman replacing Dominic Gape.
The first-half has come to a close in Bournemouth.
Bournemouth kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 56, Bournemouth's Philip Billing has been booked in Bournemouth.
Sam Surridge is replacing Philip Billing for the home team.
He's off! Alex Pattison is shown a red card.
In the minute 68, Junior Stanislas is on target to give Bournemouth a 1-0 advantage.
Gareth Ainsworth (Wycombe) is making a second substitution, with Fred Onyedinma replacing Scott Kashket.
The away team replace Garath McCleary with Daryl Horgan.
In the minute 80, Wycombe make their third substitution with Uche Ikpeazu replacing Adebayo Akinfenwa.
Joshua King is on a sub for Dominic Solanke for Bournemouth.
Dan Gosling is replacing Lewis Cook for Bournemouth at Vitality Stadium.
In the minute 81, Bournemouth make their fourth substitution with Diego Rico Salguero replacing David Brooks.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
